nodes.text: Upon the capture and delivery of said quarry, a Guild operative runs a sensor check on the bounty's body and compares it to the chain code data on the fob, confirming the identification of the acquisition.

In 9 ABY, the Bounty Hunters' Guild handed out tracking fobs to its hunters. Quarries listed on tracking fobs througout their history included a Mythrol, Grogu, and Fennec Shand, all of whom were collected by Mandalorian bounty hunter Din Djarin.
Tracking fobs first appeared in Chapter 1 of the 2019 Disney+ television series The Mandalorian, which aired on November 12, 2019.
